content:
(Please post #4 as a seperate topic https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird/form (too many issues in a single posting makes things difficult for volunteers who are answering)

What version are you using? Are you not able to sort by date as you have in the past?

See https://support.mozilla.org/kb/getting-started-thunderbird-main-window-supernova
creator: wsmwk

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content: try this:click tools>import>importfromafile>addresbook>MAB file that will import the MAB entries to abook.sqlite and will then be accessible by thunderbird. Do the steps for abook.mab and then for history.mab
creator: davidsk
